title: Moonlight Tiger
description: A peaceful story about a tiger's gentle journey through a moonlit night, from mountain to village and back again, watching over sleeping children and finding peace in the moonlight.

pages.title: Night Falls
pages.description: The tiger quietly emerges from the mountain at night

When night came, the tiger quietly came out of the mountain.

pages.title: Moonlight on Back
pages.description: White moonlight softly shines on the tiger's back

The white moonlight softly shone on the tiger's back.

pages.title: Through the Pine Forest
pages.description: The tiger passes through a pine forest, listening to the wind

The tiger passed through a pine forest, listening to the wind.

pages.title: Sparkling Pawprints
pages.description: The tiger's pawprints sparkle like little stars

Its pawprints sparkled, shining like little stars.

pages.title: Moon on Water
pages.description: The moon wavers on the water as the tiger approaches the stream

As it came to the stream, the moon wavered on the water.

pages.title: Dancing Ripples
pages.description: The ripples dance and the moonlight sparkles

The ripples danced, and the moonlight sparkled.

pages.title: White Cranes
pages.description: The tiger sees white cranes beside a lotus pond

The tiger saw white cranes beside a lotus pond.

pages.title: Cranes Soar
pages.description: The cranes spread their wings and soar into the moonlight

The cranes spread their wings and soared into the moonlight.

pages.title: Down to the Village
pages.description: The tiger walks quietly down to the village

The tiger walked quietly down to the village.

pages.title: Sleeping Children
pages.description: Children are fast asleep with moonlight flowing through windows

The children were fast asleep, and moonlight flowed through the windows.

pages.title: Grandmother's Prayer
pages.description: An old grandmother turns off her lantern and whispers a prayer

An old grandmother turned off her lantern and whispered a prayer.

pages.title: Watching from Afar
pages.description: The tiger watches from afar and nods its head

The tiger watched from afar and nodded its head.

pages.title: Looking at the Moon
pages.description: On the way back to the mountain, the tiger looks up at the moon

On the way back to the mountain, the tiger looked up at the moon.

pages.title: The Moon Smiles
pages.description: The moon seems to smile, shining brightly on the tiger

The moon seemed to smile, shining brightly on the tiger.

pages.title: Return to Sleep
pages.description: The tiger disappears into the moonlight to sleep again in the mountain

And then the tiger disappeared into the moonlight, to sleep again in the mountain.
